descriptionHtml:
This files contains two spells.  The first is a self cast spell that will remove magical effects on the caster.  The other is a non hostile spell that will remove magical effects from nearby NPCs.  To add the spells to the player:
1. Open the game console up and type in \'help dispel 4\' without the quotes
2. Scroll up until the two spells id shows up they should be:
    XX000d63
    XX0012c7
    remember what the two numbers are that are in the XX spot.
3. After you get the two spell id type in: 
    player.addspell XX000d63
    player.addspell XX0012c7
    The XX are the two digits from step 2.
That should be all the steps.
author: batman899
